title: Can't join loading screen
body:
Every time after the champ select it doesn't let me load into the game with everyone else. I always have to wait for all 9 other players to connect and go in game before I'm able to get to the loading screen. This used to happen very rarely and now after the most recent patch it happens during every single game. I tried running a full repair and completely uninstalling and reinstalling the game and it worked for maybe 2 or 3 games before it came back and happened every game consistently. This bug makes the game very hard to play because I'm forced to join the game around 3-4 minutes (usually). It's happened where it takes me about 8 minutes or not at all. 
This also only happens in league. I don't ever run into any connection errors outside of League.

replies.body:
Even if you don't have any connection issues normally, it sounds like your network is having a hard time connecting you to our game servers for some reason. This could be happening for a number of different reasons, so let's cover all our bases by checking the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

Hit me back up if you're still having issues after following that guide!
Thanks, I had to go through almost all of the ways to fix it before I got it working. Do you know if this is something that I have to keep doing every so often?
It's normal to need to do some maintenance on your network from time to time. But if you're needing to do this weekly or more, there might be more underlying issues we could look into!

I have same issue. After champ selection no loading screen. Tried to connect 100 times. End up in the after game lobby in the end with my losing team reporting me. I checked everything and sitting on a very fine and stable fiber connection.
